short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension preserves all pinned tabs indefinitely and across windows until they are unpinned

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that preserves pinned tabs when window is closed, opens all pinned tabs in any new window that is created. Tabs stay pinned until they are manually unpinned.
